all_response:
Jax: Your task is to form an alliance with the King of Alpha. Thus only requires the delivery of a letter from the King Beta to the King Alpha. However, it seems that the letter has been lost and most likely stolen. It is of the utmost importance that you retrieve the letter. You must go to the black market to find Marzaha; he will help you retrieve the letter. If he refuses to help you, show him the token of emissary from King Beta, and he will surely help.
Jax: Marzaha is in the Underground Black Market.
Jax: Your emissary token is the white jade token.
Jax: Once you retrieve the letter, go quickly to the office building of King Alpha and hand the letter to the king's representative, who will arrange for you to meet the king and forge the alliance.

all_response_exaplain: There are multiple black markets in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which black market to visit to find Marzaha. This response addresses the question of which black market to go to, specifying that it should be the Underground Black Market and not the Ghostly Black Market or Suburban Black Market. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple black markets and is unsure which one to go to.

There are multiple items in your backpack, and the previous response did not specify which item is the emissary token. This response addresses the question of which item to use as the emissary token, specifying that it is the white jade token and not the starlight gem or the golden ring. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple items in the backpack and is unsure which one to use as the emissary token.

The previous responses from Jax did not explain what to do after retrieving the letter. This response addresses what to do next or alleviates concerns about the next steps after retrieving the letter. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of not knowing what to do after retrieving the letter.

all_response:
Jax: King Bell has entrusted you with the task of forming an alliance with King Alpha. However, a direct approach to form an alliance won't work, as King Alpha is troubled and hesitant. If you can help King Alpha rescue his daughter, the princess, then forming an alliance will become feasible. His daughter has been captured by the black dragon, and you need to defeat it to save the princess. To defeat the black dragon, you must unleash the full power of the Dragon-slaying Sword. For this, you need to learn the Dragon-slaying Strike skill. After rescuing the princess, return her to King Alpha safe and sound and hand him the letter of alliance to form the alliance.
Jax: You should go to the Royal Magic School to learn Dragon-slaying Strike, as the scholars there are masters of magical combat.
Jax: The black dragon has taken the princess to the Dragon's Rest Cave. You need to go there and rescue her.
Jax: King Alpha is in Crystal City, the capital of the Kingdom of Alpha.

There are multiple cities in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify where King Alpha is located. This response addresses the question of where to find King Alpha, specifying that he is in Crystal City and not in other cities like Sunset City or Starlight City. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple cities and is unsure which one to go to for meeting King Alpha.

all_response:
Jax: In recent years, the Kingdom of Corsi has been growing stronger and stronger, hoping to annex the Kingdom of Alpha and the Kingdom of Beta, and as a result, wars have been breaking out in the border areas of the two countries with the Kingdom of Corsi, resulting in the people's lives becoming unbearable. The king of Alpha wants to form an alliance with Beta in order to fight against Corsi together. Your mission is to escort the princess of Alpha to the Kingdom of Beta to complete the alliance. You need to escort the princess directly to the city on the edge of Beta, where the King of Beta will greet you. After the princess completes the alliance, you will receive a royal record to take to the capital of the Alpha Kingdom. Prime Minister Henry will be waiting for you and the princess at the capital city gates to observe the royal record. The route between the two kingdoms is long and you will need transport but at least it is still safe to travel.
Jax: You need to escort the princess to Starlight City, a frontier city in the Kingdom of Beta. Upon reaching the city gates, you will meet Prime Minister Arthur, who will be the only person wearing blue armor. Prime Minister Arthur will lead you into the city and arrange a meeting with the King of Beta.
Jax: You should escort the princess in an off-road vehicle because the road goes through unstable wasteland.
Jax: Sunshine City is the capital of the Alpha Kingdom. Prime Minister Henry will be waiting for you at the city gates.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to form an alliance with the King of Alpha. Thus only requires the delivery of a letter from the King Beta to the King Alpha. However, it seems that the letter has been lost and most likely stolen. It is of the utmost importance that you retrieve the letter. You can go to the black market during its business hours to find Marzaha, who will help you retrieve the letter. If he refuses to help you, show him the token of the envoy from King Beta, and he will surely help you get it back.
Jax: Marzaha is in the Underground Black Market.
Jax: Your envoy token is a white jade token. Marzaha will recognize this.
Jax: Once you retrieve the letter, go quickly to the office building of King Alpha and hand the letter to the king's representative, who will arrange for you to meet the king and forge the alliance.
Jax: The business hours for all black markets are the same, from midnight to 5am.

all_response:
Jax: Your task is to form an alliance with King Alpha on behalf of King Beta. To do this, you need to deliver the alliance letter written by King Beta to King Alpha. However, you have lost the emissary token that confirms your identity, believing it to be stolen. Rumors say that your token has been found on the black market. You will need to attend the black market auction on time to buy back the token. The highest bidder wins, and since you have unlimited funds directly from the King, you can certainly buy back the token as long as you bid the highest price.
Jax: The auction for the token is at 11 pm tomorrow night. Do not be late.
Jax: The auction is taking place at the Underground Black Market.
Jax: Once you retrieve the token, go quickly to the office building of King Alpha and hand the letter to the king's representative, who will arrange for you to meet the king and forge the alliance.

all_response:
Jax: King Bell has entrusted you with the task of forming an alliance with King Alpha. However, a direct approach to form an alliance won't work, as King Alpha is troubled and hesitant. If you can help King Alpha rescue his daughter, the princess, then forming an alliance will become feasible. His daughter has been captured by the black dragon, and you need to defeat it to save the princess. To defeat the black dragon, you will need to use magic that restrains the black dragon and then attack it. After rescuing the princess, return her to King Alpha safe and sound and hand him the letter of alliance to form the alliance.
Jax: You need to use ice magic to attack the black dragon, as long as this magic can overcome it. If you are not familiar with this magic, you can go to school to learn it first.
Jax: You should go to the Royal Magic School to learn, as the scholars there are masters of magical combat.
Jax: The black dragon has taken the princess to Dragons Flight Valley. You need to go there and rescue her.
Jax: King Alpha is in Crystal City, the capital of the Alpha Kingdom. Enter the capital and walk until you reach the king's palace, where you can deliver the letter and the princess safe and sound.

background:
You are a adventurer in a game. You need to talk to Jax to find out how to complete the task of forming an alliance with King Alpha based on your existing items and skills.

You possess and can use the following items:
A King Beta's letter of alliance to you

You can use/do the following skills/actions:
Cast fire magic
Cast earth magic
Cast thunder magic

Additionally, unless explicitly restricted, you can visit the following scenes in the game:
Sunset City
Starlight City
Crystal City
Dragons Flight Valley
Coiling Dragon Lake
Sleeping Dragon Cave
Lillian Hunting School
Royal Magic School
Bartle Magic School

Your task is to ask Jax how to complete the task of forming an alliance with King Alpha based on these scenes, and your items and skills/actions. If Jax's answer is unclear or ambiguous, you need to ask clarification questions to understand his intentions and gather enough information to complete the task. Note that based on the above scenes, your items and your skills/actions will definitely allow you to complete the task of forming an alliance with King Alpha. Once you figure out how to complete the task, say "goodbye" to Jax to end your conversation.
Remember, you are a adventurer, please talk to Jax and ask him questions to find the specific steps to complete the task.
all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain which type of magic to use to defeat the black dragon. This response addresses the question of which specific magic is effective against the black dragon, specifying that ice magic should be used. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on which magic to use against the black dragon.

Jax previously mentioned that ice magic is needed but did not explain where to learn it. This response addresses the question of where to learn ice magic, specifying that it should be learned at the Royal Magic School. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on where to learn ice magic.

Jax mentioned that the princess has been captured by the black dragon but did not clarify where the black dragon has taken her. This response addresses the question of where to find the black dragon and the princess, specifying that they are in Dragons Flight Valley. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on the location of the black dragon and the princess.

There are multiple cities in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify where King Alpha is located. This response addresses the question of where to find King Alpha, specifying that he is in Crystal City. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple cities and is unsure which one to go to in order to find King Alpha.

all_response:
Jax: King Bell has entrusted you with the task of forming an alliance with King Alpha. However, a direct approach to form an alliance won't work, as King Alpha is troubled and hesitant. If you can help King Alpha rescue his daughter, the princess, then forming an alliance will become feasible. His daughter has been captured by the black dragon, and you need to defeat it to save the princess. To defeat the black dragon, you will need to use ice magic to arrest it and then subsequently attack. After rescuing the princess, return her to King Alpha safe and sound and hand him the letter of alliance to form the alliance.
Jax: You can obtain a letter of recommendation from Arthur, your former combat trainer. Arthur is the gatekeeper of Sunset City, so you can go there and he will give you the letter.
Jax: You can study ice magic at the Royal Magic School. The scholars here understand this magic.
Jax: The black dragon has taken the princess to Dragon Flight Valley. You need to go there and rescue her.
Jax: King Alpha is in Crystal City, the capital of the Alpha Kingdom. Enter the capital and walk until you reach the king's palace, where you can deliver the letter and the princess safe and sound.
